sentences.en: All your replies will be treated in the strictest confidence.
sentences.cn: 你的所有答复都将绝对保密。

sentences.en: Do what you can to give her confidence and boost her morale.
sentences.cn: 尽你所能让她树立信心，提高士气。

sentences.en: England are brimming with confidence after two straight wins in the tournament.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队在锦标赛中连赢两场后信心大增。

sentences.en: Even the most gifted can have confidence destroyed by the wrong instructor.
sentences.cn: 即使是最有天赋的人也可能会被错误的导师摧毁自信。

sentences.en: He has never exhibited the self-confidence, bordering on arrogance, of his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 他从未表现出他前任的那种近乎傲慢的自信。

sentences.en: He walked towards the summerhouse, at first furtively, then with more confidence.
sentences.cn: 他朝凉亭走去，开始还偷偷摸摸地，后来就壮大了胆子。

sentences.en: Hopes of an early cut in interest rates bolstered confidence.
sentences.cn: 利率有望早日下调，从而增强了人们的信心。

sentences.en: I felt I was doing well and my confidence began to grow.
sentences.cn: 我觉得自己干得不错，自信心就开始增加了。

sentences.en: I have never betrayed a confidence.
sentences.cn: 我从未泄露过别人的秘密。

sentences.en: If they were blooming with confidence they wouldn't need me.
sentences.cn: 他们要是信心百倍的话，也就不会叫我了。

sentences.en: Lacking self-confidence and maturity, many teenagers are left feeling very vulnerable.
sentences.cn: 许多十几岁的孩子既缺乏自信又不够懂事，所以感情上十分脆弱。

sentences.en: Martinez expressed confidence of victory at the ballot box.
sentences.cn: 马丁内斯表示了对选举获胜的信心。

sentences.en: Public confidence in the government is at an all-time low.
sentences.cn: 公众对政府的信任度处于有史以来的最低点。

sentences.en: Self-confidence means being relaxed enough to allow your lover their personal space.
sentences.cn: 自信就是放宽心，给爱人足够的私人空间。

sentences.en: She was born with a healthy dose of self-confidence.
Six months later John had developed literacy and numeracy skills, plus confidence.
sentences.cn: 6个月后，约翰已经渐渐能够识字和算数，也有了自信。

sentences.en: Their indecision has been replaced by confidence and steely determination.
sentences.cn: 他们的优柔寡断已经被自信和钢铁般的决心所取代。

sentences.en: They spent their evenings drinking wine and sharing confidences.
sentences.cn: 晚上他们就喝喝酒，说说知心话。

sentences.en: What they said was a real knock to my self-confidence.
sentences.cn: 他们的话是对我自信心的一次重大打击。

words.tran_cn: 机密的；表示信任的；获信任的

phrases.tran_cn: 置信级；可信度；信赖水准；置信水平（等于confidence coefficient）
向某人透露秘密，把某人当作知己

trans.tran_en: the feeling that you can trust someone or something to be good, work well, or produce good results
